function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerableInActorGroup(S_ACTORGROUP_BLOCKERS_01, false)
	ActivateWeakIce(idActorKilled)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idActorKilled, S_POWER_SORCDEATHWAVE_WEST)
	
	local tAdds = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("Camp_Frac_Tundra_EncounterWaves_01_Adds")
	for i, idActor in pairs(tAdds) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idActor) then
			Hydra.ActorKill(idActor)
		end
	end

	-- Disable encounter spawners
	for i, actorID in ipairs(tEncounterWaves_01) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(actorID) then Hydra.ActorDisable(actorID) end;
	end
	
	west_sorc_killed = true
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, snoSubzone)
	Camps.PlayIntroConv(idActorPlayer, CONV_INTRO, S_GBID_PV_HAS_PLAYED_INTRO)
	Hydra.WeatherOverride(Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorPlayer), "weather_FracturedPeaks_Malnok_blizzard")
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)
	if west_sorc_killed == true then
		local roll = Hydra.GetRandomFloat(0.5, 1)
		Hydra.Wait(roll)
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorDetector) then
			Hydra.ActorKill(idActorDetector)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	local roll = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, 4)
	local idSpawn = nil
	if roll == 1 then
		idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_melee_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
	elseif roll == 2 then 
		idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_melee_shield_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
	elseif roll == 3 then
		idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_ranged_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
	elseif roll == 4 then
		idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_twohand_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
	end
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSpawn, "Generic_Taunt")
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	local tShards = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActor(idActorDetector)
	for i, idShard in pairs(tShards) do
		local roll = Hydra.GetRandomFloat(0.3, 0.6)
		Hydra.Wait(roll)
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idShard) then
			Hydra.ActorKill(idShard)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)
	for i, idMonster in pairs(tIntroMonsters) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idMonster) then
			Hydra.ActorSetAIBehavior(idMonster, Hydra.AIBEHAVIOR_TYPE_NORMAL)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idMonster) then
			Hydra.ActorSetAIBehavior(idMonster, Hydra.AIBEHAVIOR_TYPE_NORMAL)
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	if Hydra.ActorGetSNOName(idActorKilled) == "FracturedPeaksHU_FrozenPeople_Guard_02_Dyn" then
		local idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_ranged_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSpawn, "Generic_Taunt")
	else
		local idSpawn = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("skeleton_melee_shield_cold", idActorKilled, false, 0, 0)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSpawn, "Generic_Taunt")
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	if sorc_tracker == 1 then
		Hydra.WeatherIntensityOverride(Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorKiller), 0.6, 1000)
	elseif sorc_tracker == 2 then
		Hydra.WeatherOverride(Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorKiller), "weather_FracturedPeaks_Malnok")
		Hydra.WeatherIntensityOverride(Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorKiller), 0.5, 1000)
	elseif sorc_tracker == 3 then
		Hydra.WeatherIntensityOverride(Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorKiller), 0.25, 1000)
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	local idSorc = Hydra.ActorFindNearestActor(idActorKilled, 40, false, true, "goatman_sorcerer_unique_CMP_Frac_Tundra_Miniboss")
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSorc) then 
		ChampKilled(idSorc)
	end

end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)
	if found_boss == false then
		idPlayer = idActor
		found_boss = true
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(S_CONV_FINDBOSS, idPlayer);
	end
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	local tInvis = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActor(Arena_Blocker_Controller)
	for i, idInvis in pairs(tInvis) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idInvis) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoOperate(idInvis)
		end
	end
--	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerableInActorGroup(S_ACTORGROUP_BLOCKERS_BOSS, false)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idActorKilled, S_POWER_SORCDEATHWAVE_BOSS)
--	KillSorcBlockers(S_ACTORGROUP_BLOCKERS_BOSS) --ph until I can get ^^ to work
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(CONV_PreClaim, idActorKiller)
	Hydra.BossEncounterManuallyComplete(BOSS_ENCOUNTER_LEVEL_AREA);
	
	local tAllPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
     
    for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tAllPlayers) do
        -- Drop the TreasureClass, which contains both "always" and "first time" rewards
        -- The First Time stuff is conditioned by the flag that is set after the drop occurs
        Hydra.TreasureClassDropAtActorForPlayer(idActorKilled, "FirstTimeReward_Stronghold_Malnok", idPlayer)
         
        -- Set the variable, to mark that this player has recieved a reward
        Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idPlayer, "FirstTimeReward_Stronghold_Malnok")
    end
	Hydra.MusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent", "Music_Frac_MalnokStronghold_Complete")
end

unk_c47e01a:
function KillSorcBlockers(sActorGroup)
	-- Destroys all of the ice crystal blocker props for each of the minibosses
	local tActorGroup = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(sActorGroup);
	ShuffleTable(tActorGroup);
	for i, actorID in pairs(tActorGroup) do
		Hydra.Wait(.05);
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(actorID) then Hydra.ActorKill(actorID) end;
	end	
end

function SorcHoldoutStart(idSorc, iSorcsKilled)
	local S_SUMMON_POWER = Hydra.PowerSNOFromName(Hydra.ReferencePower("Summoned_Animating_Ceiling"))
	if iSorcsKilled == 0 then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSorc, Sorc_KnockbackShield)
		local ChampLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "ChampLoc")[1]
		idFirstChamp = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(Melee_Champion, ChampLoc, false, 0, 0, Hydra.MR_ELITE, S_SUMMON_POWER)
	elseif iSorcsKilled == 1 then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSorc, Sorc_KnockbackShield)
		local ChampLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "ChampLoc")[1]
		local Champ = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(Ranged_Champion, ChampLoc, false, 0, 0, Hydra.MR_ELITE, S_SUMMON_POWER)
		Hydra.ActorsEnableLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "WavesSpawner")
	elseif iSorcsKilled == 2 then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(idSorc, Sorc_KnockbackShield)
		local ChampLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "ChampLoc")[1]
		local Champ = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(Sorc_Champion, ChampLoc, false, 0, 0, Hydra.MR_ELITE, S_SUMMON_POWER)
		Hydra.ActorsEnableLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "WavesSpawner")
		Hydra.ActorsEnableLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "Skeleton_Wave_Spawners")
	end
	sorc_tracker = sorc_tracker+1
end

function ActivateWeakIce(idSorcKilled)
	local tWeakIce = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorcKilled, "WeakIce")
	for i, idWeakIce in pairs(tWeakIce) do
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idWeakIce, Hydra.TEAM_MONSTER_DEFAULT)
		Hydra.ActorSetNoDamage(idWeakIce, false)
	end
	
	local tWeakIceShells = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorcKilled, "WeakIceShells")
	for i, idWeakIceShell in pairs(tWeakIceShells) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idWeakIceShell) then
			Hydra.ActorKill(idWeakIceShell)
		end
	end
	
	local tAmbush = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorcKilled, "Ambush")
	for i, idAmbush in pairs(tAmbush) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(idAmbush)
	end
end

function ChampKilled(idSorc)
	Hydra.BuffRemove(Sorc_KnockbackShield, "ICE_SHIELD", idSorc)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idSorc, "AnimKey_Neutral")
	Hydra.ActorSetNeverDie(idSorc, false)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idSorc)
	local tAddSpawners = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSorc, "AddSpawner")
	for i, idSpawner in pairs(tAddSpawners) do
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, true)
	end
	if idSorc == SorcWest then
		Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idSorc, W_Rope)
	elseif idSorc == SorcNorth then
		Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idSorc, N_Rope)
	elseif idSorc == SorcSouth then
		Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idSorc, S_Rope)
	end
end

function REALSetGroupInvulnerable(sActorGroup)
	local tGroup = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(sActorGroup)

	for i, idGroup in pairs(tGroup) do
		Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idGroup, true)
		Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idGroup, false)
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idGroup, Hydra.TEAM_SCENERY)
--		Hydra.ActorSetNeverDie(idGroup, true)
	end
end
